who.title: Who
who.bodytext: All Massachusetts residents can use MAPLE to fulfill their civic responsibility to our state democracy.

when.title: When
when.bodytext: MAPLE welcomes testimony at any time, but we recommend submitting it before the scheduled hearing date for the greatest impact. Hearing dates are listed on the bill pages of this website.

how.title: How
how.bodytext: We help you craft your testimony, publish it to the community, and send it directly to the right legislators.

why.title: Why
why.bodytext: Your voice is important; we help amplify it. We make the Massachusetts' legislature's testimony process more accessible and transparent.

what.title: What
what.bodytext: MAPLE makes it easy to submit testimony and see testimony submitted by others.
